description:
In a scenic location in the Wachau region overlooking the town of Krems, The 4-star superior Steigenberger Hotel & Spa Krems is 2 km from the centre. It offers a large spa area, and a restaurant.

Guests of the Steigenberger Hotel & Spa Krems can relax in the 3,000 m² spa area, which is spread over 3 levels. It includes an indoor and an outdoor pool, saunas, a salt-water steam bath, and a relaxation room with an open fireplace. Beauty treatments are provided on request.

Ancient monasteries and abbeys located at the Danube River, such as Melk, Gottweig and Dürnstein, can be easily reached by car from the Steigenberger Hotel & Spa Krems. The Längenfeld Golf Club is only 6 km away. Bike and car rental is available at the property.
